title: Learning Design Practical Competencies Enhancement: Adaptive Practitioner-Led Classroom Discourse Instructional Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Education Theories and Classroom Management Experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design lesson scenarios by applying five core questioning techniques that facilitate classroom discourse.
Learners can utilize three or more feedback strategies that expand students' responses when explaining mathematical concepts.
Learners can conduct peer evaluations via a mobile platform and propose improvement plans based on actual lesson videos.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
